snippet: Fatima Gordon, 28, was shot and killed on Thursday night on Clarkson Avenue in Prospect-Lefferts Gardens, an area where violence has been rampant all summer, residents said.
abstract: Fatima Gordon is shot and killed on Clarkson Avenue in the Prospect-Lefferts Gardens section of Brooklyn, by a man who rode through a crowd on a bicycle, opening fire; residents say violence has been rampant in the area all summer, with many saying they do not venture outdoors at night.
lead_paragraph: Fatima Gordon, 28, was shot and killed on Thursday night on Clarkson Avenue in Prospect-Lefferts Gardens, an area where violence has been rampant all summer, residents said.

headline.seo: Woman Is Killed on a Violent Street in Brooklyn
headline.main: A Killing on a Brooklyn Block Known for Its Violence
headline.print_headline: A Killing on a Brooklyn Block Known for Its Violence
